channel.title: CVE Feed for HCL Software -- HCL Connections
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HCL Software -- HCL Connections

item.title: CVE-2020-4084|2024-08-04T07:52:20.933Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20connections
item.description: HCL Connections v5.5, v6.0, and v6.5 are vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.

item.title: CVE-2023-28018|2024-08-02T12:23:30.903Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20connections
item.description: HCL Connections is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by improper validation on certain requests. Using a specially-crafted request an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause denial of service for affected users.

item.title: CVE-2023-28018|2024-06-04T17:28:57.411Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20connections
item.description: HCL Connections is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by improper validation on certain requests. Using a specially-crafted request an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause denial of service for affected users.
